about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure in the hidden object game ""Connected Hearts: The Musketeers Saga DLC""! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This downloadable content contains three new locations! In the main game, explore the captain's quarters and visit Mercedes' wedding to save her from an unwanted marriage! In the bonus game, visit the Hall of Kings!

In the new locations you can learn new details about the characters, uncover all the secrets that will help you fix the situation. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

💘 EXPLORE THE CAPTAIN'S CABIN!
Here you can find so many entertaining things that keep their secrets! Solve all the puzzles and find all the hidden objects!

💘 VISIT THE MERCEDES WEDDING!
It would seem that there is no more fun and happy celebration than the wedding of two people in love! But as if not! It's up to you to figure it all out by thoroughly exploring the grounds.

💘 EXPLORE THE HALL OF KINGS!
In the bonus game, you have to explore the hall of kings and find out what secrets are kept there!

Are you ready to solve all the mysteries and save the kingdom? Start your journey and discover all the achievements!
